title: Unjust Perma ban
body: First of all I will admit I have been toxic and the way I handled the situation is wrong, In my most recent game I was perma banned for feeding however, in this game I had people throw insults at me such as "I hope you die of cancer" and stuff like that. And honestly I think a perma for my second warning is ridiculous, I have only had one ban prior to this at a 14 day ban, I have already sent a support ticket but I just want to stress that I do take responsibility for my actions, that I can understand why I should receive punishment but as I have already said a Perma ban is too far given the situation, If riot actually look at my account I am rarely toxic. This specific account has helped me through some tough times dealing with depression, as well as this i have spent a lot of money in this account, If there is some way I can speak to someone about this thats not through a ticket I would greatly appreciate it. However if I just get the reply of " We will not unban you" I will be taking this further and I will be contacting the PR team as in my opinion this is ridiculous, I feed in a game but and i get perma banned but theres people in that game telling me to die of cancer which can cause real life harm as oppose to me ruining someones game.

is there a limit  to reset the punishment ? i mean from season to season ?
when you get 14 days and you stay cool for a month or any period 
will it reset to chat res ?

It does reset, but it's not based on time or season.  It's based on a number of clean, non-toxic games played.  The number varies based on severity of the punishment that the player had; i.e. a player who was on a 14 day suspension will need more clean games to reset to a chat restriction than a player who was on a 25 game chat restriction would need to reset to a 10 game chat restriction.  And here's the thing... if a player is still being toxic, just not severely toxic, they aren't going to be working towards that reset very quickly.  It retards their progress if they are being regularly reported, even if the system doesn't issue them a punishment based on the reports.

5th? Is OP lying? And did they get the 2 chat bans then 2 14-day bans?

>However if I just get the reply of " We will not unban you" I will be taking this further and I will be contacting the PR team as in my opinion this is ridiculous, I feed in a game but and i get perma banned

Yes, feeding will get you banned. If you've been punished before, it'll be permanent. There is no excuse for intentionally feeding. Ever.

If others are being toxic, they will be punished according to the severity and their history. That still does not give you the right to intentionally feed or be toxic in **any** way back to them.
There is no excuse for intentionally feeding. There is no way you're getting unbanned, especially since you've already had a 14 day ban previously.
Logs or gtfo?

You can't have a post titled "Unjust Perma Ban," then open with an admission to being incredibly toxic.
Furthermore, your first offense wasn't the 14 day ban. Your first offense was a chat restriction (you can't use chat or have limited times to use it), as was the second, and I believe third offense. The 14 day ban occurs when you continue to get reported for being toxic/feeding/trolling _even after_ your first 3 warnings. It escalates then to a permanent ban if you _STILL_ continue to get reported for the same toxicity/feeding/trolling after the 14 day ban. So your permanent ban is like your 5th offense that tells us that you continued to behave in a manner that got you consistently reported for unsportsmanlike behaviors. If you got through 3 chat restrictions and a 14 day ban and didn't pick up on the fact that your behavior was getting you punished over and over again, you deserve your perma ban.
